string.text:
The KRISS Vector SMG is the ideal choice for law enforcement and military units seeking a controllable, compact, weapon system for close quarter combat environments.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Origin: %c[ui_gray_1]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_1]Kriss USA, Inc.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Production Year: %c[ui_gray_1]2006
